abstract.p: A betting exchange system receiving bet requests from a plurality of users over a communications network, each of the requests comprising a bet backing an outcome or laying an outcome. The betting exchange system matches respective bets which back and lay a given outcome, and automatically arbitrages unmatched bet requests to thereby generate one or more implied bets made by the system in respect to an outcome for which no bet requests have been received. The implied bets are generated so that the system does not lose money on the implied bets taken together.

"SISTEMA DE BOLSA DE APOSTA". Um sistema de bolsa de apostas é implementado em um servidor de rede acessível pela internet e permite que apostadores solicitam pedidos de apostas para eventos de concordância ("back") e discordância ("lay"), e ajustam os preços em que eles desejam apostar, desta forma criando um verdadeiro mercado de duas vias. Os sistema proporciona ainda uma junção de arbitragem, com apostas implícitas sendo geradas pelo sistema quando apostadores não fizerem apostas com relação a um resultado específico de modo que as apostas podem ser executadas mesmo de um lado do mercado não foi aceito. Isto pode proporcionar apostas em linha e espalhada para futebol, rugby, tênis ou corrida motorizada.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: Internet betting matches bets and lays

abstract.p: A betting exchange system is implemented on a web server accessible over the Internet and permits punters to submit bet requests to both back and lay events, and to set the prices at which they wish to bet, so giving rise to a true two-way market. The system also provides an arbitrage function, with implied bets being generated by the system when punters have not placed bets in respect of a particular outcome, so that bets can be executed even if one side of the market has not been taken up. This can give spread or line betting for football, rugby, tennis or motor racing.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: UN SISTEMA DE INTERCAMBIO DE APUESTAS.

abstract.p: According to the present invention, there is provided a betting exchange system comprising server means configured to receive bet requests from a plurality of users over a communications network, each of said requests comprising a bet backing an outcome or laying an outcome, wherein the server means is operable to match respective bets which back and lay a given outcome. Allowing a user access to both sides of a betting transaction, by specifying whether he wishes to back or lay an outcome, provides the user with additional flexibility, and can facilitate a liquid two-way market. In addition, it can ensure the most efficient, and hence competitive, prices.

Un sistema de intercambio de apuestas es implementado en un servidor de red accesible sobre la Internet y permite a los aficionados a someter peticiones de apuesta para ambos acontecimientos de retroceder y de apostar, y fijar los precios en los cuales desean apostar, dando lugar a un mercado de dos maneras legitimas. El sistema tambien provee de una funcion de arbitraje, siendo generadas las apuestas implicadas por el sistema cuando los aficionados no han puesto las apuestas por lo que se refiere a un resultado determinado, para asi poder ejecutarse las apuestas, incluso si una parte del mercado no se ha aceptado.

A betting exchange system for permitting a plurality of users to bet against one another comprises: means for receiving over a communications network a plurality of bet requests which an originator of the request is prepared to bet that the given outcome will occur

means for receiving over a communications network a plurality of bet requests laying the given outcome, each laying bet request specifying a price and a size at which an originator of the request is prepared to bet that the given outcome will not occur
means for aggregating backing bet requests specifying the same price
means for aggregating laying bet requests specifying the same price

means for automatically matching a received backing bet request with individual or aggregated laying bet requests to complete a betting transaction and means for automatically matching a received laying bet request with individual or aggregated backing bet requests to complete a betting transaction.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHOD FOR OPERATION OF COMPUTERIZED SYSTEM FOR PROVIDING POSSIBLE BETTING OF A SET OF USERS WITH EACH OTHER

abstract.p: FIELD: computer engineering. ^ SUBSTANCE: in the method, requests are received from a set of users through communication network for making a bet, containing a wager on an outcome of event or against the event, price and size are determined, synchronization of received requests is performed and generation of prices with consideration of bets, determining one and the same price. ^ EFFECT: decreased time needed to exchange data about bets being made and configuration of system during synchronization of bets on different outcome of event. ^ 12 cl, 15 dwg

According to the present invention, there is provided a betting exchange system comprising server means configured to receive bet requests from a plurality of users over a communications network, each of said requests comprising a bet backing an outcome or laying an outcome, wherein the server means is operable to match respective bets which back and lay a given outcome. Allowing a user access to both sides of a betting transaction, by specifying whether he wishes to back or lay an outcome, provides the user with additional flexibility, and can facilitate a liquid two-way market. In addition, it can ensure the most efficient, and hence competitive, prices.

abstract.p: A betting exchange system receiving a plurality of bet requests backing a given outcome, each backing bet request specifying a price and a size at which an originator of the request is prepared to bet that the given outcome will occur. The betting exchange system receiving a plurality of bet requests laying the given outcome, each laying bet request specifying a price and a size at which an originator of the request is prepared to bet that the given outcome will not occur. The betting exchange system aggregating backing bet requests specifying the same price, aggregating laying bet requests specifying the same price, automatically matching a received backing bet request with individual or aggregated laying bet requests to complete a betting transaction, and automatically matching a received laying bet request with individual or aggregated backing bet requests to complete a betting transaction.
